title: Life Science HiSET.S.3.1 (Q6)
prompt: Which of the following is a valid hypothesis for why dinosaurs speciated into different species of birds?
feedback: Speciation means that a single species diverges into multiple species. A hypothesis is a proposed explanation based on available evidence that serves as a starting point for further investigation. The best answer is “After the Earth’s environment was drastically altered by an asteroid impact, smaller dinosaurs—requiring less food and possessing a better ability to hide—gradually evolved into birds.” This answer offers a potential explanation that can serve as a basis of further study.  The other answers represent assumptions, data, or conclusions—these do not meet the criteria for a hypothesis.
